title: SWD - Intern
description: Developed a RAG-based conversational agent MVC backend for large sensitive documents using Spring Boot, Azure OpenAI, and Prompt Advisors, enhancing processing accuracy by 30%. Optimized document indexing time by designing and implementing a parallel processing framework for batch embedding creation, leading to an 80% reduction in indexing time and significantly improving system efficiency. Designed a prototype iOS app with an intuitive UI and integrated the backend using Alamofire, demonstrating potential for a seamless user experience.

title: Software Engineering Intern - Fullstack
description: Architected and deployed a highly scalable client-side application using Next.js on Vercel with Sanity as CMS, supporting a user base of 200k and achieving a 19% reduction in operational costs. Optimized page loading time by implementing custom HTML for lazy-loading YouTube videos, increasing the Lighthouse score by 20 points and boosting conversions by 15%. Led the integration of Typesense Vector Search, achieving a 60% increase in search precision and significantly improving user experience.

title: Software Engineering Intern - Frontend
description: Enhanced website performance by 15% and increased page load speed by 30% by leading responsive site development using React.js, Next.js, and Redux. Integrated Google and Twitter OAuth using Firebase, resulting in a 40% increase in user registrations and streamlined authentication process. Utilized SendGrid for transactional emails, optimizing email deliverability and increasing customer engagement by 25%.
